Notes
Validation Errors:
Elf-Desert Runner Alternatives: Desert Runner may not be combined with Elven Magic, Eternal Grudge, Lightbringer, Silent Hunter, Spirit Of The Waters, or Woodcraft
Elf-Dreamspeaker Alternatives: Dreamspeaker may not be combined with Elven Immunities or Lightbringer
Elf-Eternal Grudge Alternatives: Eternal Grudge may not be combined with Elven Magic, Desert Runner, Lightbringer, Silent Hunter, Spirit Of The Waters, or Woodcraft
Elf-Lightbringer Alternatives: Lightbringer may not be combined with Elven Immunities, Dreamspeaker, Elven Magic, Desert Runner, Eternal Grudge, Silent Hunter, Spirit Of The Waters, or Woodcraft
Elf-Silent Hunter Alternatives: Silent Hunter may not be combined with Elven Magic, Desert Runner, Eternal Grudge, Lightbringer, Spirit Of The Waters, or Woodcraft
Elf-Spirit Of The Waters Alternatives: Spirit Of The Waters may not be combined with Weapon Familiarity (Elven Curve Blade), Elven Magic, Desert Runner, Eternal Grudge, Lightbringer, Silent Hunter, or Woodcraft
